## Node.path() method

Get an XPath that uniquely identifies the node across descendants of its root.

**Signature:**

```typescript
path(options?: Node.Traversal): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | [Node.Traversal](./alfa-dom.node.traversal.md) | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

string
